review: Certainly adds to our viewing pleasures. A fine product very comfortably priced.
author: Leonard Block

review: We love the fire stick! Use it in our bedroom. Easy to set up and easy to use. We purchased the voice remote which is awesome.
author: Susan Crimmins

review: Wish I had bought this sooner.  We use it all the time now.  Such a better selection of movies than On Demand.
author: CaliMom "calimom"

review: Very happy with the Fire Stick and plan to purchase another very soon. Easy directions to follow, easy to install, and works very well, we love it.
author: patricia a. hurst

review: Very pleased with this purchase. It was delivered just before Christmas while I was on vacation and I watched close to a dozen movies. It streams flawlessly and is extremely easy to use and set up. To really enjoy the entire experience I recommend becoming an Amazon Prime member. If you purchase a lot from Amazon, it's a no brainer.
author: mklon

review: Fire TV Stick is everything you said it would be!  The one question I do have, when do none prime movies flip over to being prime movies?
author: Richard R. Thayer "Video File"

review: Everything and more.  Easy to use and fun
author: Carol Tungate

review: Easy install, works quickly and accurately.  It is so much better than that nonfunctioning, problamatic Chrome stick!
author: Amazon Customer "HDLUVR"
